# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the button is in an enabled state.

## Declaration

```swift
var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], CarPlay doesn’t call the button’s handler, and it changes the button’s appearance to reflect its disabled state.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring the Button’s Attributes

- **title**: The button’s title.
